data.title: Fashion Encyclopedia
data.text:
Laura Love made her debut in 2010 when she walked the spring VPL show in New York. She also signed with Ford Models.

In 2011 Laura Love appeared in a French Vogue editorial that was a 15 page spread photographed by Bruce Weber, she appeared in an editorial for Teen Vogue that was photographed by Mark Segal, she modeled for the Vera Wang resort presentation in New York, she appeared in an editorial for Vogue that was photographed by Peter Lindbergh and she walked the spring shows for Nanette Lepore, Yigal Azrouel and Band of Outsiders in New York.

In 2012 Laura Love modeled for the pre-fall presentation for Vera Wang in New York and she also walked the fall shows for Sophie Theallet, Band of Outsiders, Costello Tagliapietra, Vivienne Westwood and Mark Fast in New York and London.

In 2013 Laura Love appeared in ad campaigns for Vera Wang and Bottega Veneta and she appeared in editorials for Vogue Japan, Teen Vogue and Pop Magazine.

In 2014 Laura Love walked for Michael van der Ham and for the John Rocha fall/winter show. She appeared on the covers of Jalouse and Harper’s Bazaar Brazil and she appeared in editorials for American Vogue, Mixte, Harper’s Bazaar Brazil, Jalouse and Glamour France.

More recently in 2015 Laura Love has been part of ad campaigns for Kate Spade, she has appeared in editorials for Russh and Proenza Schouler and was also on the cover of Singles Magazine.
